review: through this movie i have learned so much about india's rich culture and history. the movie is outstanding and breathtaking. the love story between them is heart breaking but the true richness of this movie is kisna and how he is portrayed. the courage, love, commitment and most importantly his honor and devotion to his duties and his strong sense of right and wrong is what makes this movie so special.

i never truly understood as to why this movie has such low critical reception when movies like these seldom comeby.
a musical masterpiece and a poignant love story. yes, unlike all movies this isn't perfect but in no way does this deserve such low critical reception. 
i love this movie. perhaps very few of vivek oberoi movies which deserve praise.
best bollywood love story and epic songs. surreal scenes. but best part about this movie is isha's dance
i love this movie. i feel the movie real. heart touching movie. thank you so much subhas ghai get.
